WITH purchases AS (
      SELECT
        customer_id,
        ticket_id,
        purchased_at,
        (face_value - COALESCE(discount_amount,0)) AS net_revenue_excl_fees
      FROM raw_ticket_sales
      WHERE purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-08-15 00:00:00'
        AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-09-12 00:00:00'
        AND COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) = false
    ),
    last_touch AS (
      SELECT
        p.ticket_id,
        MAX(t.touch_ts) AS last_touch_ts
      FROM purchases p
      JOIN marketing_touches t
        ON t.customer_id = p.customer_id
       AND CAST(t.touch_ts AS DATE) <= CAST(p.purchased_at AS DATE)
      GROUP BY 1
    )
    SELECT
      mt.campaign_id,
      COUNT(DISTINCT p.ticket_id) AS attributed_tickets,
      SUM(p.net_revenue_excl_fees) AS attributed_net_revenue
    FROM purchases p
    JOIN last_touch lt ON lt.ticket_id = p.ticket_id
    JOIN marketing_touches mt
      ON mt.customer_id = p.customer_id
     AND mt.touch_ts = lt.last_touch_ts
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY attributed_net_revenue DESC;

        AND order_ts <  TIMESTAMP '2024-05-16 00:00:00'
    ),
    rfm AS (
      SELECT
        customer_id,
        MAX(ts) AS last_activity_ts,
        COUNT(*) AS txn_count,
        SUM(value) AS total_value
      FROM activity
      GROUP BY 1
    )
    SELECT
      CASE
        WHEN (TIMESTAMP '2024-05-16 00:00:00' - last_activity_ts) <= INTERVAL '30 days' AND txn_count >= 5 THEN 'DIEHARD'
        WHEN (TIMESTAMP '2024-05-16 00:00:00' - last_activity_ts) <= INTERVAL '90 days' AND txn_count >= 2 THEN 'ENGAGED'
        WHEN txn_count = 1 THEN 'NEW'
        ELSE 'LAPSED'
      END AS rfm_segment,
      COUNT(*) AS customers,

    FROM rfm
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY customers DESC;

    attached AS (
      SELECT DISTINCT t.ticket_id
      FROM tickets t
      JOIN merch m
        ON m.customer_id = t.customer_id
       AND m.order_ts >= t.purchased_at
       AND m.order_ts <  (t.purchased_at + INTERVAL '14 days')
    )
    SELECT
      COUNT(DISTINCT tickets.ticket_id) AS tickets_sold,
      COUNT(DISTINCT attached.ticket_id) AS tickets_with_merch,
      (COUNT(DISTINCT attached.ticket_id)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT tickets.ticket_id),0)) AS merch_attach_rate
    FROM tickets
    LEFT JOIN attached ON attached.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id;

-- dashboard_extract: exec summary
WITH activity AS (
      SELECT customer_id, purchased_at AS ts, (face_value - COALESCE(discount_amount,0)) AS value
      FROM raw_ticket_sales
      WHERE purchased_at >= (TIMESTAMP '2024-09-14 00:00:00' - INTERVAL '180 days')
        AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-09-14 00:00:00'
        AND COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) = false
      UNION ALL
      SELECT customer_id, order_ts AS ts, (quantity * unit_price - COALESCE(discount_amount,0)) AS value
      FROM raw_merch_orders
      WHERE order_ts >= (TIMESTAMP '2024-09-14 00:00:00' - INTERVAL '180 days')
        AND order_ts <  TIMESTAMP '2024-09-14 00:00:00'
    ),
    rfm AS (
      SELECT
        customer_id,
        MAX(ts) AS last_activity_ts,
        COUNT(*) AS txn_count,
        SUM(value) AS total_value
      FROM activity
      GROUP BY 1
    )
    SELECT
      CASE
        WHEN (TIMESTAMP '2024-09-14 00:00:00' - last_activity_ts) <= INTERVAL '30 days' AND txn_count >= 5 THEN 'DIEHARD'
        WHEN (TIMESTAMP '2024-09-14 00:00:00' - last_activity_ts) <= INTERVAL '90 days' AND txn_count >= 2 THEN 'ENGAGED'
        WHEN txn_count = 1 THEN 'NEW'
        ELSE 'LAPSED'
      END AS rfm_segment,
      COUNT(*) AS customers,
      AVG(total_value) AS avg_value
    FROM rfm
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY customers DESC;

SELECT
      DATE_TRUNC('day', purchased_at) AS day,
      channel,
      COUNT(*) AS tickets,
      SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS refunded_tickets,
      (SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)) AS refund_rate
    FROM raw_ticket_sales
    WHERE purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-11-06 00:00:00'
      AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-11-13 00:00:00'
    GROUP BY 1,2
    HAVING COUNT(*) >= 50
    -- sanity-check filters
ORDER BY refund_rate DESC, tickets DESC;

WITH base AS (
      SELECT
        category,
        status,
        created_ts,
        resolved_ts,
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (resolved_ts - created_ts)) / 3600.0 AS resolution_hours
      FROM support_tickets
      WHERE created_ts >= TIMESTAMP '2024-12-13 00:00:00' AND created_ts <  TIMESTAMP '2024-12-17 00:00:00' AND resolved_ts IS NOT NULL AND category = 'SEATING'
    )
    SELECT
      category,
      COUNT(*) AS resolved_tickets,
      AVG(resolution_hours) AS avg_resolution_hours,
      PERCENTILE_CONT(0.9) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY resolution_hours) AS p90_resolution_hours
    FROM base
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY resolved_tickets DESC;

-- dashboard_extract: exec summary
WITH purchases AS (
      SELECT
        customer_id,
        ticket_id,
        purchased_at,
        (face_value - COALESCE(discount_amount,0)) AS net_revenue_excl_fees
      FROM raw_ticket_sales
      WHERE purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-03-15 00:00:00'
        AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-03-19 00:00:00'
        AND COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) = false
    ),
    last_touch AS (
      SELECT
        p.ticket_id,
        MAX(t.touch_ts) AS last_touch_ts
      FROM purchases p
      JOIN marketing_touches t
        ON t.customer_id = p.customer_id
       AND CAST(t.touch_ts AS DATE) <= CAST(p.purchased_at AS DATE)
      GROUP BY 1
    )
    SELECT
      mt.campaign_id,
      COUNT(DISTINCT p.ticket_id) AS attributed_tickets,
      SUM(p.net_revenue_excl_fees) AS attributed_net_revenue
    FROM purchases p
    JOIN last_touch lt ON lt.ticket_id = p.ticket_id
    JOIN marketing_touches mt
      ON mt.customer_id = p.customer_id
     AND mt.touch_ts = lt.last_touch_ts
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY attributed_net_revenue DESC;

WITH base AS (
      SELECT
        t.ticket_id,
        t.event_id,
        t.seat_section,
        DATE_TRUNC('week', e.event_date::timestamp) AS event_week
      FROM raw_ticket_sales t
      JOIN dim_event e ON e.event_id = t.event_id
      WHERE t.purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-12-16 00:00:00' AND t.purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-12-20 00:00:00' AND COALESCE(t.refunded_flag,false) = false AND t.seat_section = 'SUITE'
    ),
    scans AS (
      SELECT DISTINCT ticket_id, 1 AS attended_flag
      FROM raw_attendance_scans
      WHERE scanned_at IS NOT NULL
    )
    SELECT
      b.event_week,
      b.seat_section,
      COUNT(DISTINCT b.ticket_id) AS tickets,
      SUM(COALESCE(s.attended_flag,0)) AS attended,
      (SUM(COALESCE(s.attended_flag,0))::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT b.ticket_id),0)) AS attendance_rate
    FROM base b
    LEFT JOIN scans s ON s.ticket_id = b.ticket_id
    GROUP BY 1,2
    ORDER BY b.event_week, b.seat_section;

WITH purchases AS (
      SELECT
        customer_id,
        ticket_id,
        purchased_at,
        (face_value - COALESCE(discount_amount,0)) AS net_revenue_excl_fees
      FROM raw_ticket_sales
      WHERE purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-09-23 00:00:00'
        AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-10-01 00:00:00'
        AND COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) = false
    ),
    last_touch AS (
      SELECT
        p.ticket_id,
        MAX(t.touch_ts) AS last_touch_ts
      FROM purchases p
      JOIN marketing_touches t
        ON t.customer_id = p.customer_id
       AND CAST(t.touch_ts AS DATE) <= CAST(p.purchased_at AS DATE)
      GROUP BY 1
    )
    SELECT
      mt.campaign_id,
      COUNT(DISTINCT p.ticket_id) AS attributed_tickets,
      SUM(p.net_revenue_excl_fees) AS attributed_net_revenue
    FROM purchases p
    JOIN last_touch lt ON lt.ticket_id = p.ticket_id
    JOIN marketing_touches mt
      ON mt.customer_id = p.customer_id
     AND mt.touch_ts = lt.last_touch_ts
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY attributed_net_revenue DESC;

WITH activity AS (
      SELECT customer_id, purchased_at AS ts, (face_value - COALESCE(discount_amount,0)) AS value
      FROM raw_ticket_sales
      WHERE purchased_at >= (TIMESTAMP '2024-02-06 00:00:00' - INTERVAL '90 days')
        AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-02-06 00:00:00'
        AND COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) = false
      UNION ALL
      SELECT customer_id, order_ts AS ts, (quantity * unit_price - COALESCE(discount_amount,0)) AS value
      FROM raw_merch_orders
      WHERE order_ts >= (TIMESTAMP '2024-02-06 00:00:00' - INTERVAL '90 days')
        AND order_ts <  TIMESTAMP '2024-02-06 00:00:00'
    ),
    rfm AS (
      SELECT
        customer_id,
        MAX(ts) AS last_activity_ts,
        COUNT(*) AS txn_count,
        SUM(value) AS total_value
      FROM activity
      GROUP BY 1
    )
    SELECT
      CASE
        WHEN (TIMESTAMP '2024-02-06 00:00:00' - last_activity_ts) <= INTERVAL '30 days' AND txn_count >= 5 THEN 'DIEHARD'
        WHEN (TIMESTAMP '2024-02-06 00:00:00' - last_activity_ts) <= INTERVAL '90 days' AND txn_count >= 2 THEN 'ENGAGED'
        WHEN txn_count = 1 THEN 'NEW'
        ELSE 'LAPSED'
      END AS rfm_segment,
      COUNT(*) AS customers,
      AVG(total_value) AS avg_value
    FROM rfm
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY customers DESC;

    ),
    scans AS (

WITH base AS (
      SELECT
        t.ticket_id,
        t.event_id,
        t.seat_section,
        DATE_TRUNC('week', e.event_date::timestamp) AS event_week
      FROM raw_ticket_sales t
      JOIN dim_event e ON e.event_id = t.event_id
      WHERE t.purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-09-17 00:00:00' AND t.purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-10-01 00:00:00' AND COALESCE(t.refunded_flag,false) = false AND t.seat_section = '200'
    ),
    scans AS (
      SELECT DISTINCT ticket_id, 1 AS attended_flag
      FROM raw_attendance_scans
      WHERE scanned_at IS NOT NULL
    )
    SELECT
      b.event_week,
      b.seat_section,
      COUNT(DISTINCT b.ticket_id) AS tickets,
      SUM(COALESCE(s.attended_flag,0)) AS attended,
      (SUM(COALESCE(s.attended_flag,0))::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT b.ticket_id),0)) AS attendance_rate
    FROM base b
    LEFT JOIN scans s ON s.ticket_id = b.ticket_id
    GROUP BY 1,2
    ORDER BY b.event_week, b.seat_section;

WITH sessions AS (
      SELECT
        campaign_id,

        MAX(CASE WHEN event_type = 'CHECKOUT_START' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS started_checkout,
        MAX(CASE WHEN event_type = 'PURCHASE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS purchased
      FROM raw_digital_events
      WHERE event_ts >= TIMESTAMP '2024-01-07 00:00:00' AND event_ts <  TIMESTAMP '2024-01-09 00:00:00' AND device_type = 'MOBILE'
      GROUP BY 1,2
    )
    SELECT

      (SUM(purchased)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)) AS session_conversion_rate
    FROM sessions
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY sessions DESC;

WITH activity AS (
      SELECT customer_id, purchased_at AS ts, (face_value - COALESCE(discount_amount,0)) AS value
      FROM raw_ticket_sales
      WHERE purchased_at >= (TIMESTAMP '2024-12-09 00:00:00' - INTERVAL '90 days')
        AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-12-09 00:00:00'
        AND COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) = false
      UNION ALL
      SELECT customer_id, order_ts AS ts, (quantity * unit_price - COALESCE(discount_amount,0)) AS value
      FROM raw_merch_orders
      WHERE order_ts >= (TIMESTAMP '2024-12-09 00:00:00' - INTERVAL '90 days')
        AND order_ts <  TIMESTAMP '2024-12-09 00:00:00'
    ),
    rfm AS (
      SELECT
        customer_id,
        MAX(ts) AS last_activity_ts,
        COUNT(*) AS txn_count,
        SUM(value) AS total_value
      FROM activity
      GROUP BY 1
    )
    SELECT
      CASE
        WHEN (TIMESTAMP '2024-12-09 00:00:00' - last_activity_ts) <= INTERVAL '30 days' AND txn_count >= 5 THEN 'DIEHARD'
        WHEN (TIMESTAMP '2024-12-09 00:00:00' - last_activity_ts) <= INTERVAL '90 days' AND txn_count >= 2 THEN 'ENGAGED'
        WHEN txn_count = 1 THEN 'NEW'
        ELSE 'LAPSED'
      END AS rfm_segment,
      COUNT(*) AS customers,
      AVG(total_value) AS avg_value
    FROM rfm
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY customers DESC;

WITH tickets AS (
      SELECT customer_id, ticket_id, purchased_at, event_id
      FROM raw_ticket_sales
      WHERE purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-10-05 00:00:00'
        AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-10-08 00:00:00'
        AND COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) = false
    ),
    merch AS (
      SELECT customer_id, order_id, order_ts
      FROM raw_merch_orders
      WHERE order_ts >= TIMESTAMP '2024-10-05 00:00:00'
        AND order_ts <  (TIMESTAMP '2024-10-08 00:00:00' + INTERVAL '14 days')
    ),
    attached AS (
      SELECT DISTINCT t.ticket_id
      FROM tickets t
      JOIN merch m
        ON m.customer_id = t.customer_id
       AND m.order_ts >= t.purchased_at
       AND m.order_ts <  (t.purchased_at + INTERVAL '14 days')
    )
    SELECT
      COUNT(DISTINCT tickets.ticket_id) AS tickets_sold,
      COUNT(DISTINCT attached.ticket_id) AS tickets_with_merch,
      (COUNT(DISTINCT attached.ticket_id)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT tickets.ticket_id),0)) AS merch_attach_rate
    FROM tickets
    LEFT JOIN attached ON attached.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id;

WITH purchases AS (
      SELECT
        customer_id,
        ticket_id,
        purchased_at,
        (face_value - COALESCE(discount_amount,0)) AS net_revenue_excl_fees
      FROM raw_ticket_sales
      WHERE purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-03-12 00:00:00'
        AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-03-26 00:00:00'
        AND COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) = false
    ),
    last_touch AS (
      SELECT
        p.ticket_id,
        MAX(t.touch_ts) AS last_touch_ts
      FROM purchases p
      JOIN marketing_touches t
        ON t.customer_id = p.customer_id
       AND CAST(t.touch_ts AS DATE) <= CAST(p.purchased_at AS DATE)
      GROUP BY 1
    )
    SELECT
      mt.campaign_id,
      COUNT(DISTINCT p.ticket_id) AS attributed_tickets,
      SUM(p.net_revenue_excl_fees) AS attributed_net_revenue
    FROM purchases p
    JOIN last_touch lt ON lt.ticket_id = p.ticket_id
    JOIN marketing_touches mt
      ON mt.customer_id = p.customer_id
     AND mt.touch_ts = lt.last_touch_ts
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY attributed_net_revenue DESC;

-- dashboard_extract: exec summary
WITH base AS (
      SELECT
        category,
        status,
        created_ts,
        resolved_ts,
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (resolved_ts - created_ts)) / 3600.0 AS resolution_hours
      FROM support_tickets
      WHERE created_ts >= TIMESTAMP '2024-06-16 00:00:00' AND created_ts <  TIMESTAMP '2024-06-18 00:00:00' AND resolved_ts IS NOT NULL AND category = 'BILLING'
    )
    SELECT
      category,
      COUNT(*) AS resolved_tickets,
      AVG(resolution_hours) AS avg_resolution_hours,
      PERCENTILE_CONT(0.9) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY resolution_hours) AS p90_resolution_hours
    FROM base
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY resolved_tickets DESC;

      b.seat_section,
      COUNT(DISTINCT b.ticket_id) AS tickets,
      SUM(COALESCE(s.attended_flag,0)) AS attended,
      (SUM(COALESCE(s.attended_flag,0))::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT b.ticket_id),0)) AS attendance_rate
    FROM base b
    LEFT JOIN scans s ON s.ticket_id = b.ticket_id
    GROUP BY 1,2
    ORDER BY b.event_week, b.seat_section;

SELECT
      DATE_TRUNC('month', created_ts) AS month,
      stage,
      COUNT(*) AS deals_created,
      SUM(amount) AS pipeline_amount
    FROM crm_deals
    WHERE created_ts >= TIMESTAMP '2024-07-13 00:00:00' AND created_ts <  TIMESTAMP '2024-07-20 00:00:00' AND stage = 'QUALIFIED'
    GROUP BY 1,2
    ORDER BY month, stage;

WITH sessions AS (
      SELECT
        campaign_id,
        session_id,
        MAX(CASE WHEN event_type = 'PAGE_VIEW' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS saw_page,
        MAX(CASE WHEN event_type = 'CHECKOUT_START' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS started_checkout,
        MAX(CASE WHEN event_type = 'PURCHASE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS purchased
      FROM raw_digital_events
      WHERE event_ts >= TIMESTAMP '2024-01-01 00:00:00' AND event_ts <  TIMESTAMP '2024-01-13 00:00:00' AND device_type = 'DESKTOP'
      GROUP BY 1,2
    )
    SELECT
      campaign_id,
      COUNT(*) AS sessions,
      SUM(saw_page) AS sessions_with_page,
      SUM(started_checkout) AS sessions_with_checkout,
      SUM(purchased) AS sessions_with_purchase,
      (SUM(purchased)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)) AS session_conversion_rate
    FROM sessions
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY sessions DESC;

SELECT
      DATE_TRUNC('day', purchased_at) AS day,
      channel,
      COUNT(*) AS tickets,
      SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS refunded_tickets,
      (SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)) AS refund_rate
    FROM raw_ticket_sales
    WHERE purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-03-29 00:00:00'
      AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-04-02 00:00:00'
    GROUP BY 1,2
    HAVING COUNT(*) >= 50
    ORDER BY refund_rate DESC, tickets DESC;

SELECT
      DATE_TRUNC('day', purchased_at) AS day,
      channel,
      COUNT(*) AS tickets,
      SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS refunded_tickets,
      (SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)) AS refund_rate
    FROM raw_ticket_sales
    WHERE purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-10-01 00:00:00'
      AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-11-15 00:00:00'
    GROUP BY 1,2
    HAVING COUNT(*) >= 50
    ORDER BY refund_rate DESC, tickets DESC;

SELECT
      DATE_TRUNC('day', purchased_at) AS day,
      channel,
      COUNT(*) AS tickets,
      SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS refunded_tickets,
      (SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)) AS refund_rate
    FROM raw_ticket_sales
    WHERE purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-10-08 00:00:00'
      AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-11-05 00:00:00'
    GROUP BY 1,2
    HAVING COUNT(*) >= 50
    -- sanity-check filters
ORDER BY refund_rate DESC, tickets DESC;

WITH purchases AS (
      SELECT
        customer_id,
        ticket_id,
        purchased_at,
        (face_value - COALESCE(discount_amount,0)) AS net_revenue_excl_fees
      FROM raw_ticket_sales
      WHERE purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-07-01 00:00:00'
        AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-09-22 00:00:00'
        AND COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) = false
    ),
    last_touch AS (
      SELECT
        p.ticket_id,
        MAX(t.touch_ts) AS last_touch_ts
      FROM purchases p
      JOIN marketing_touches t
        ON t.customer_id = p.customer_id
       AND CAST(t.touch_ts AS DATE) <= CAST(p.purchased_at AS DATE)
      GROUP BY 1
    )
    SELECT
      mt.campaign_id,
      COUNT(DISTINCT p.ticket_id) AS attributed_tickets,
      SUM(p.net_revenue_excl_fees) AS attributed_net_revenue
    FROM purchases p
    JOIN last_touch lt ON lt.ticket_id = p.ticket_id
    JOIN marketing_touches mt
      ON mt.customer_id = p.customer_id
     AND mt.touch_ts = lt.last_touch_ts
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY attributed_net_revenue DESC;

SELECT
      DATE_TRUNC('day', t.purchased_at) AS day,
      t.channel,
      SUM(gross_revenue) AS gross_revenue,
      SUM(face_value - COALESCE(discount_amount,0) + COALESCE(fees,0)) AS net_revenue,
      COUNT(DISTINCT t.ticket_id) AS tickets_sold
    FROM analytics.vw_ticket_sales_enriched t
    JOIN dim_customer c ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id
    WHERE t.purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-07-17 00:00:00' AND t.purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-07-24 00:00:00' AND COALESCE(t.refunded_flag,false) = false AND t.channel = 'PARTNER' AND c.country = 'SG' AND c.segment = 'FAMILY'
    GROUP BY 1,2
    ORDER BY day, t.channel;

-- dashboard_extract: exec summary
WITH base AS (
      SELECT
        t.ticket_id,
        t.event_id,
        t.seat_section,
        DATE_TRUNC('week', e.event_date::timestamp) AS event_week
      FROM raw_ticket_sales t
      JOIN dim_event e ON e.event_id = t.event_id
      WHERE t.purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-03-10 00:00:00' AND t.purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-03-21 00:00:00' AND COALESCE(t.refunded_flag,false) = false AND t.seat_section = '100'
    ),
    scans AS (
      SELECT DISTINCT ticket_id, 1 AS attended_flag
      FROM raw_attendance_scans
      WHERE scanned_at IS NOT NULL
    )
    SELECT
      b.event_week,
      b.seat_section,
      COUNT(DISTINCT b.ticket_id) AS tickets,
      SUM(COALESCE(s.attended_flag,0)) AS attended,
      (SUM(COALESCE(s.attended_flag,0))::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT b.ticket_id),0)) AS attendance_rate
    FROM base b
    LEFT JOIN scans s ON s.ticket_id = b.ticket_id
    GROUP BY 1,2
    ORDER BY b.event_week, b.seat_section;

-- dashboard_extract: exec summary
SELECT
      DATE_TRUNC('day', purchased_at) AS day,
      channel,
      COUNT(*) AS tickets,
      SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS refunded_tickets,
      (SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)) AS refund_rate
    FROM raw_ticket_sales
    WHERE purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-06-16 00:00:00'
      AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-06-19 00:00:00'
    GROUP BY 1,2
    HAVING COUNT(*) >= 50
    ORDER BY refund_rate DESC, tickets DESC;

SELECT
      DATE_TRUNC('day', purchased_at) AS day,
      channel,
      COUNT(*) AS tickets,
      SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS refunded_tickets,
      (SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)) AS refund_rate
    FROM raw_ticket_sales
    WHERE purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-12-10 00:00:00'
      AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-12-17 00:00:00'
    GROUP BY 1,2
    HAVING COUNT(*) >= 50
    ORDER BY refund_rate DESC, tickets DESC;

WITH tickets AS (
      SELECT customer_id, ticket_id, purchased_at, event_id
      FROM raw_ticket_sales
      WHERE purchased_at >= TIMESTAMP '2024-10-08 00:00:00'
        AND purchased_at <  TIMESTAMP '2024-10-16 00:00:00'
        AND COALESCE(refunded_flag,false) = false
    ),
    merch AS (
      SELECT customer_id, order_id, order_ts
      FROM raw_merch_orders
      WHERE order_ts >= TIMESTAMP '2024-10-08 00:00:00'
        AND order_ts <  (TIMESTAMP '2024-10-16 00:00:00' + INTERVAL '3 days')
    ),
    attached AS (
      SELECT DISTINCT t.ticket_id
      FROM tickets t
      JOIN merch m
        ON m.customer_id = t.customer_id
       AND m.order_ts >= t.purchased_at
       AND m.order_ts <  (t.purchased_at + INTERVAL '3 days')
    )
    SELECT
      COUNT(DISTINCT tickets.ticket_id) AS tickets_sold,
      COUNT(DISTINCT attached.ticket_id) AS tickets_with_merch,
      (COUNT(DISTINCT attached.ticket_id)::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT tickets.ticket_id),0)) AS merch_attach_rate
    FROM tickets
    LEFT JOIN attached ON attached.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id;
